src:
Kembali Terpilih Jadi Exco, Yoyok Sukawi Ingin Mengawal Pembinaan Usia Muda
04 Nov 2019, 11:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - CEO PSIS Semarang, Alamsyah Satyanegara Sukawijaya kembali terpilih sebagai anggota Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI periode 2019-2023. Dia mengumpulkan 45 suara dalam Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Kembali terpilih sebagai Exco, pria yang akrab disapa Yoyok Sukawi itu mengaku akan fokus mengawal pembinaan usia muda. Meskipun, sejauh ini belum ada pembagian tugas komite.
"Kita belum dibagi tugas komitenya, tapi saya akan fokus mengawal program pembinaan usia muda yang sudah on track baik," katanya kepada Bola.net, Senin (4/11/2019).
Menurut Yoyok, pembinaan usia muda sebenarnya sudah berjalan cukup baik dengan digelarnya kompetisi kelompok usia yang dikemas dengan Elite Pro Academy. Bahkan, sukses digelar dalam dua tahun terakhir.
"Cukup dipertahankan dilanjutkan programnya, Elite Pro Academy dan lain-lain," lanjut Yoyok.
Yoyok Sukawi sebelumnya memang sudah menjabat sebagai anggota komite eksekutif PSSI. Namun, dia lebih fokus mengurusi masalah hukum, sesuai tugasnya sebagai wakil ketua Komite Hukum.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Re-elected as Exco, Yoyok Sukawi Wants to Escort Youth Coaching
Nov 04 2019, 11:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSIS Semarang CEO, Alamsyah Satyanegara Sukawijaya was re-elected as a member of the PSSI Executive Committee (Exco) for 2019-2023. He collected 45 votes in the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Re-elected as Exco, the man who is familiarly called Yoyok Sukawi admitted he would focus on overseeing youth training. Although, so far there has been no division of duties of the committee.
"We have not yet divided the committee's duties, but I will focus on overseeing the youth training program that is already on track," he told Bola.net, Monday (11/04/2019).
According to Yoyok, coaching at a young age has actually gone quite well with the convening of an age group competition packed with Elite Pro Academy. In fact, success was held in the last two years.
"It is enough to continue the program, Elite Pro Academy and others," continued Yoyok.
Yoyok Sukawi had previously served as a member of the PSSI executive committee. However, he is more focused on dealing with legal issues, according to his duties as vice chairman of the Legal Committee.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
